name: Decidueye
description: As if wielding a bow, it launches the arrow quills hidden among the feathers of its wings. Decidueye’s shots never miss.

abilities.name: Deep Forest Camo
abilities.effect: Prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from your opponent’s Pokémon V and Pokémon-GX.

attacks.name: Splitting Arrow
attacks.effect: This attack also does 20 damage to 2 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
